channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: The Justice Department has embarked on a monthslong effort to prosecute people accused of assaulting federal officers during protests of President Don...

item.title: Inflation report to be released Thursday expected to show slight uptick in November
item.description: The inflation rate stands a percentage point higher than the Fed's target of 2%.

item.title: Pope Leo taps Bishop Ronald Hicks to succeed Cardinal Dolan
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has named Bishop Ronald Hicks of Joliet, Illinois, to succeed retiring Timothy Cardinal Dolan as archbishop of New York.

item.title: Bit by bit, small US groups chip away at historic levels of social isolation
WATCH: World's 1st gene-edited baby takes 1st steps
item.description: KJ Muldoon received the first-of-its-kind gene therapy for a potentially fatal disease and is now marking major developmental milestones.

item.title: WATCH: 3 rescued after car plunges into icy Illinois pond
item.description: Dramatic body camera video shows the moment police officers rescued three people after their vehicle crashed into an icy pond in Glendale Heights, Ill...

item.title: WATCH: 'It was a miracle': Bondi Beach survivor speaks out
item.description: Arsen Ostrovsky says he was enjoying the Hannukah celebrations with his family Sunday when two gunmen opened fire, killing 15 people and wounding doze...

item.title: An early look at our town hall and debate series, launching in 2026
item.description: "Things That Matter," a series of planned town halls and debates sponsored by Bank of America, will launch early next year.

item.title: Russia preparing for another year of war despite peace talks, Zelenskyy says
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said in an address on Wednesday that Russia is preparing "the coming year as a year of war," despite ongoing p...

item.title: Trump Media to merge with fusion energy company TAE in $6 billion deal
item.description: President Trump's media company is joining forces with a company working to commercialize fusion energy.

item.title: CBS News and The Free Press launch town hall and debate series
item.description: "Things That Matter," a series of planned town halls and debates sponsored by Bank of America, will launch early next year.

item.title: China fumes as White House announces record $10B in arms sales to Taiwan
item.description: The Trump administration's announcement of plan to sell Taiwan a record $10 billion worth of weapons draws an angry response from China.

item.title: Pulitzer Prize-winning correspondent Peter Arnett, who reported on Vietnam and Gulf wars, has died
